about_the_game:
"Great Feats of Ancient Rus: Defenders of the Homeland" is an exciting real-time strategy game where you'll immerse yourself in the atmosphere of ancient Russian mythology and become the leader of a thriving settlement constantly under threat from lizardmen attacks.

Your task is to build a mighty settlement and develop it into a flourishing city, using resources and technologies available to you in this challenging era. Gather wood, stone, iron, and other resources to improve your settlement and create powerful military units.

However, it's not all straightforward, as lizardmen, ancient enemies of the people of ancient Rus, constantly threaten your settlement. You'll need to learn to defend your lands and fight off enemies. Organize defense, build walls and towers, create armies, and prepare for battles for your homeland!

But you're not just defending your lands - you'll also need to raid lizardmen bases to gather additional resources and resist enemies on their territory. Your bravery and strategic skills will determine your success on the battlefield.

In addition to conventional defense and attack methods, you'll have access to ancient Slavic magic. The powers of Perun, the ancient god of war, will be your ally in battle. Use his might to summon storms upon enemies, invoke protective barriers, and empower your warriors. Only those who possess the wisdom of the ancients and the strength of Perun can withstand the lizardmen and ensure the prosperity of their Homeland.

Take up the challenge and lead your people in the battle for survival and prosperity in "Great Feats of Ancient Rus: Defenders of the Homeland"!

name: Подвиги древних Русов

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400T CPU @ 1.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: ntel® Core™ i7-7700T CPU @ 2.90GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Great Feats of Ancient Rus: Defenders of the Homeland" is an exciting real-time strategy game where you'll immerse yourself in the atmosphere of ancient Russian mythology and become the leader of a thriving settlement constantly under threat from lizardmen attacks.
supported_languages:
Russian*, English
*languages with full audio support
